textos_fuente.text: Contact Hogwash - Hogwash Soap Home Soap Bath Moisturiser Gifts Accessories About Us Blog Contact Us Select Page There are several ways to contact Hogwash Soap… HOGWASH SOAP is a small one woman business based in Great Torrington, North Devon. I am Christine, that very woman, and that is me there with my crazy dog Dora! I have been making cold processed natural soap since 2008, firstly as a Maker at The Soap Kitchen and then founder of Hogwash Soap. I know it’s a cliché and almost obligatory for a soap maker to have eczema but I did develop it at the tender age of ten, when back in the day it was called dermatitis. I was unfortunate enough, however, to be misdiagnosed by an eccentric GP, who brought her small dog to work every day, and sat it on her desk. She asked me if I’d stroked any cows, disbelieved me when I assured her I  hadn’t, and prescribed a potion for ringworm that stripped the top layer of my skin off…well it was the 1970s!   Unlike ringworm, there is no medical cure for eczema, but I now know that with gentle soap and regular moisturising, the skin has a fighting chance to heal itself. I have developed the whole HOGWASH range because it works for me, and I wanted a luxury product that didn’t break the bank and that smelled gorgeous. There is a liquid soap, WASH for body, hands and for foamy bath time (without SLS). A MOISTURE CREAM for hands, face and body, which is soothing and calming. The SOAP is made with just three oils, Shea butter, olive oil, and coconut oil, plus the essential oils for their properties and fragrance.  I add no colour because three oils are enough for a sensitive skin. The more time and care you put into making soap, the better the bar. When it is ready I pour into moulds where it’s left to cure (dry) for at least 4 weeks before I cut, stamp and wrap it in FAIRTRADE handmade paper. Hogwash Soap’s high oil content means that it works to protect the skin, not strip it of its natural oils. Most commercial soap has its oils extracted, making it harder and harsher, also cheaper. Making good quality soap is an art and you will notice the difference. We supply various B&Bs and holiday accommodation and the feedback we get from guests is fantastic and we know generates sales once they’ve used it. If you would like to be supplied with Hogwash in your business, please talk to us. If you would like to talk in person and peruse our lovely soapy wares, catch me in the summer at CROYDE CRAFT MARKET every THURSDAY from 10-4 (May-Sept). Feel free to drop an email with any questions, requests. Not everything is on the website, for example, we can make bespoke gift boxes but you need to let us know what you’d like in them. Hope you love your Hogwash, and thank you for reading this. Reach Us Hogwash Soap 1 Castle St, Torrington, Devon EX38 8EZ Phone: 07935286 923 Get In Touch Name Email Address Message Send Request Trade Enquiries There is NO MINIMUM ORDER. We currently offer, to the retail trade and holiday accommodation markets, our full range as available on our website. In addition to this, we can also produce products to customer specifications. We also supply handmade, hand wrapped, and bespoke wedding favours, please contact us for details. If you are interested in Hogwash products or have a specific enquiry, please email us for more information. We look forward to hearing from you. Hogwash Soap 2025 | Varde Creative | Privacy Policy | My Account | Basket

She's hogging the telephone and no-one else can use it. oorneem, beset يأخُذ أو يَسْتَعْمِل أكثر مما يجب взимам повече от необходимото ми arrebanhar zabrat pro sebe in Beschlag nehmen beslaglægge μονοπωλώ acaparar ahnitsema زياد گرفتن hamstrata accaparer לְהִשתַלֵט על जरूरत से ज्यादा करना uzimati sve sebi, biti bezobziran kisajátít, ráül memonopoli taka meira en sinn skerf impossessarsi di ひとり占めにする 제몫보다 더 차지하다 pasiglemžti, pasičiupti (egoistiski un ilgstoši) lietot; izmantot memonopoli inpalmen , opeisen forsyne seg med mer enn sin del , beslaglegge przetrzymywać خیټور açambarcar a pune mâna pe заграбастывать zabrať (pre seba), privlastniť si polastiti se okupirati roffa åt sig เอาอย่างละโมบ hissesinden fazla almak 過多地或過久地取用 прибрати до рук کسی چیز پر قبضہ کر لینا chiếm giữ 过多地拿取 ˈhogwash noun ( especially American ) nonsense. onsin, nonsens بَقايا الطَّعام глупости tolice žvásty der Quatsch sludder ανοησίες pamplina , disparate , tontería rämps مهمل hölynpöly foutaise חֲסַר עֶרֶך बेमतलब की बात lupetanje, glupost sületlenség omong kosong vitleysa fesseria くだらないこと 가치가 없는 것 paistalas, niekai muļķības; stulbības mengarut onzin sludder , vås , tøv bzdury مهمل tolice fleacuri чушь plané reči larifari splačine smörja, rappakalja ความไร้สาระ saçma , zırva (尤在美語中)胡扯 дурниця بکواس chuyện nhảm nhí 废话 go the whole hog to do something completely. Music is a good thing; and after all that soul-butter and hogwash I never see it freshen up things so, and sound so honest and bully. View in context Leila de Lima on Friday described as "pure hogwash " the sedition complaint filed by the Philippine National Police-Criminal Investigation and Detection Group (PNP-CIDG) against her and other personalities in connection with the "Bikoy" videos. De Lima calls sedition raps pure hogwash Opposition Senator Leila de Lima on Friday slammed as 'pure hogwash ' the sedition case and other complaints filed against Vice President Leni Robredo and 35 others who were linked to the 'Ang Totoong Narcolist' videos. VTEN Past Projects Events Upcoming Events Past Event Videos & Resources Hogwash Farm Hogwash Farm views: 1249 Local Farms » Hogwash Farm Business Name: Hogwash Farm Address: 708 Goodrich Four Corners , Norwich, Vermont 5055 Description: Hogwash Farm is a small, diversified meat farm specializing in pastured pork and poultry and grass-fed lamb. We also provide a small amount of grass-fed beef for purchase that is raised by a neighboring farm. Our pigs are born and raised on the farm and spend their lives enjoying the fresh VT air and roaming our organic pastures and woodland, foraging to their hearts content, and are fed a locally sourced and produced non-GMO grain. Our chickens eat an organic grain as well as all the bugs and grass they can handle as they spend their days on the pastures surrounding the home farm. The Jacob Sheep flock wow farm visitors with their fun spots and horns and graze our hilly VT pastures. Open year-round. About Us Hogwash - Hogwash is a creative studio. Like an agency, we develop campaigns. Like a production company, we make films. Work About Reel Hogsquad Contact There’s more than one way to clean a pig. Hogwash is an independent, majority female owned creative agency and production company with hubs in New York and Miami. Hybrid by design, since day one we've been dedicated to crafting work we’re genuinely proud of. We’re here to do meaningful stuff, minus the fluff, with good people by our side. Simple as that. We are thinkers. Copywriters Art Directors Creative Directors Strategists Account Directors We are makers. Directors Producers Writers Editors Illustrators Curated teams that flex Elastic and adaptable we build out crews with the right mix of unique skillsets for every challenge. Our founders touch every project, and our core team scales quickly and efficiently by pulling from a global network we actually know and trust. Buckle up, partner. We’re Thelma, you’re Louise. Except in our story, we’re steering clear of cliffs. As flexible partners, we can act as an extension of your team or plug in wherever you need us. Imagine, an on-demand creative agency and production studio ready for anything that comes up. As true partners, we've got your back every time. We like to get our hands dirty. Our creative and production folks roll up their sleeves and work together from the first brainstorm to final delivery. Directors weigh-in earlier on creative concepts and strategy is tied directly to executions, allowing for greater value and efficiency. Relentlessly curious and shamelessly hands-on, our team sweats the details every step of the way. When you do good, you feel good. Period. We believe great ideas dig into human truths, that creativity shines when everyone has a seat at the table, and beautiful storytelling always delivers. Our time? Split between commercial work and passion projects for causes we believe in, because, hey, meaningful work just hits different. Cooking up dreams. Making ideas sizzle. Cutting the fat. Feeding gobble-worthy content. Cooking up dreams. Making ideas sizzle. Cutting the fat. Feeding gobble-worthy content. HIT US UP.
